articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, Monday.
					 The president in the message said that he was pleased that he extended the warmest congratulations and greetings to Kim Jong Un, and through him, to the friendly Korean people on the founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea on behalf of the state and people of Palestine and on his own behalf. The message wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the Korean people greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 We are proud of the historic friendship and bonds of mutual respect between our two countries and two peoples, the message said, adding:
					
					 We highly appreciate your country for proactively supporting the national right and struggle of our Palestinian people for building an independent state with Eastern Kuds as its capital where aggression is terminated and peace, reconciliation and co-existence are ensured.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Kim Jong Un from Ethiopian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Kim Jong Un from Ethiopian President
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of sympathy from Mulatu Teshome, president of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, on September 20.
					 In the message the president expressed deep sympathy as regards the flood that caused human and material damage in the DPRK in September 2016 on behalf of the people and government of Ethiopian and on his own behalf.
					
					 He also expressed deep condolence to the families of the victims and the people and government of the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK's Principled Stand on Implementation of New Sustainable Development Agenda Clarified
articles.content:
DPRK's Principled Stand on Implementation of New Sustainable Development Agenda Clarified
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The representative of the DPRK made a speech at the Second Committee of the 71st UN General Assembly (economy and finance) on Oct. 4.
					 He clarified the principled stand of the DPRK as follows, saying that the committee's position and role are important in ensuring the successful implementation of the 2030 sustainable development agenda which was adopted on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the United Nations last year:
					
					 First, all member nations' right to independent development should be respected in order to ensure successful implementation of the sustainable development agenda.
					
					 In order to realize the sustainable development goals set forth for the promotion of welfare for humankind, it is an issue of top priority to end high-handed and arbitrary practices that pose political, military and economic pressure and threat to other countries while antagonizing their political systems guided by unilateral standard and concept, and to create peaceful environment.
					
					 Second, the course of the implementation of the sustainable development agenda should be oriented toward the promotion of development of national economy of each country and toward the establishment of fresh international economic order.
					
					 The present reality requires international financial organizations including the World Bank, the International Monetary Fund and the World Trade Organization not to tolerate the monopolistic position occupied by a handful of specified countries but to fully ensure the representative right of developing countries including newly emerging economics.
					
					 In this context, bigger care should be given to sustainable development of countries and peoples in the least developed countries, inland or island countries and those countries which are locked in disputes or under foreign occupation with an emphasis put on relieving inequality among countries in implementing the 2030 sustainable development agenda.
					
					 The DPRK representative said that a definite precedence is being given to science and technology in the DPRK and firm push is given to the construction of a socialist economic power in reliance on the strength, technology and natural resources available in the country.
					
					 The DPRK government will as ever strive hard to get rid of the old international order and establish fair and righteous international economic relationship and actively contribute to the international efforts to attain the goals set forth at the new sustainable development agenda.

articles.title: Senior Party, State, Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party, State, Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Senior party, state and army officials visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Monday, the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Among the visitors were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang, and officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid there was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 Placed there were a floral basket in the joint name of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 They made bows to the great leaders who lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life and youth and students visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 71st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Seen standing before the statues was a floral basket sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), institutions, industrial establishments, farms and schools in Pyongyang.
					
					 A floral basket was placed there in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 Floral baskets in the names of units of the KPA and KPISF, institutions and enterprises, bouquets and flowers were laid before the statues and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in various places of the city including Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio. 
					
					 Service personnel, officials, working people and school youth and students across the country visited the statues and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in their residential areas.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Marked in Central and Local Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Marked in Central and Local Areas of DPRK
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Art performances were given in Pyongyang and local areas on the 71st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A concert "Song to the Party" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theater.
					
					 A revolutionary opera "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight" truthfully showing the fighting spirit of an anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter ideologically and artistically and philosophically was performed at the Pyongyang Grand Theater. 
					
					 A music, dance and poem "Story Conveyed by 'Arirang'" was given at the Ponghwa Art Theatre and a drama "Blood Vessel" at the National Theatre.
					
					 Circus and magic performances of the National Circus took place at the Pyongyang Circus Theater and Magic Theater, instilling optimism into the people and school youth and children.
					
					 Artistes of art troupes of North Phyongan, North Hwanghae, Jagang, North Hamgyong and other provinces staged celebrations.
					
					 A performance "Song of Blessed People" was given by the working people and school youth and children in Kaesong City at Kaesong Square.

articles.title: WPK Enjoys Absolute Support of Popular Masses
articles.content:
WPK Enjoys Absolute Support of Popular Masses
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea has led the Korean revolution along the road of victory and glory for 70 years, enjoying the absolute support of the popular masses.
					 Through their protracted struggle and life, the Korean people came to have immovable faith that the greatness of the WPK is that of leader and that there is no future for them without leader always. And they have always shared their lot with the Party in the grim annals of the revolution.
					
					 During the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War, workers of the Rakwon Machine Complex told President Kim Il Sung caring much for their livelihood that there would no question for them to rehabilitate and they would be well-off after victory in the war.
					
					 In the difficult postwar period, the workers at the then Kangson Steel Plant turned out 120,000 tons of steel at the blooming mill with a capacity of 60,000 tons, in hearty response to the call of the President that it would be good for the country if it has 10,000 tons of rolled steel in addition.
					
					 In the late 1990s when the country had to make arduous march, the forced march, all the people turned out to defend socialism under the Songun (military-first) politics shaped by leader Kim Jong Il, with the firm conviction that they would surely emerge victorious as they are guided by the WPK.
					
					 The song "We'll Travel One Road Forever" ardently sung by the Korean people represents their indomitable will to follow supreme leader Kim Jong Un only under any storm and stress.
					
					 Thanks to the heroic people, the WPK could turn the country into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence and open a new era of building a powerful socialist nation despite the persistent blockades by the imperialists.

articles.title: Uribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Sportsmen's Federation in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Monday.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Art Performance "Life Story of Youth" Given
articles.content:
Art Performance "Life Story of Youth" Given
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The music and dance story "Life Story of Youth" was given at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Monday, the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 It was enjoyed by Kim Yong Nam and other senior officials of the Party and state, chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, merited persons, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and labor innovators of institutions and industrial establishment in Pyongyang. 
					
					 The performance began with prologue chorus and dance "Campfire, Flare Up," male solo "Life Story of Youth," male chorus "We Carry forward March to Mt. Paektu" and other colorful numbers impressively depicting how young Koreans intensely loyal to the Party built the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station.
					
					 The performers made a successful art representation of the youth who have grown strong in ideology and faith as they are possessed of the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience for truthfully representing the young vanguard who created the spirit of hero youth of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Monday, the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Dancing parties began amid the playing of song "Glory to Our Great Party" at their venues in the capital city of Pyongyang including the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.
					
					 Youth and students presented dances, paying the highest tribute and extending eternal glory to leader Kim Jong Il who developed the WPK into the Party of President Kim Il Sung and powerful guiding force for the Songun revolution and laid an eternal foundation for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Party and socialism.
					
					 They cheerfully danced, convinced of the glorious future of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party holding Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 They danced to add to the festive mood representing the steadfast will of passionate youth.
					
					 Similar events took place in provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Remodeling Project of Kim Il Sung Stadium Completed
articles.content:
Remodeling Project of Kim Il Sung Stadium Completed
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Kim Il Sung Stadium has been successfully remodeled at the foot of picturesque Moran Hill in Pyongyang.
					 The stadium has more than 40,000 seats, football ground covered with new man-made lawn, entrance hall for players, FIFA office, referees room, coach room, interview room, dope check room, treatment room and scientific and technological dissemination room and other modern sports and cultural and welfare facilities and service amenities.
					
					 It can host not only state political and cultural events and international and domestic sports games but also sports activities and cultural and emotional life of working people and school youth and children.
					
					 A ceremony of its completion took place Sunday.
					
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam and others, officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), members of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, builders of the army and society who took part in the remodeling project, officials, sportspersons and employees of the sports field and the stadium and working people, youth and students in Pyongyang.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, addressed the ceremony.
					
					 He said that the stadium which has been remodeled under the WPK's plan of building a sports power is the sports center for the people built as a monumental edifice thanks to the initiative and energetic guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called on the officials and employees of the stadium to meticulously organize its management so that the loving care of the Party would reach the sportspersons and working people more effectively.
					
					 There was a football match between the April 25 Team and the Hwaebul Team.

articles.title: DPRK Women Footballers Advance into Quarterfinals
articles.content:
DPRK Women Footballers Advance into Quarterfinals
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- League matches of 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup finished on Saturday.
					 The games began from September 30 in Jordan. The DPRK team belongs in group C together with the teams of Nigeria, Brazil and England.
					
					 The DPRK team drew with England 3:3 and beat Brazilian rival 1:0.
					
					 After trouncing the Nigerian team 3:0, the DPRK team took the first place in the group.
					
					 The DPRK team will play the quarterfinal game with the Ghanaian team on October 13.

articles.title: Joint Seminar Held to Mark Anniversary of October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Joint Seminar Held to Mark Anniversary of October 4 Declaration
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar of the north, the south and overseas was held in Shenyang, China from Oct. 6 to 7 to mark the ninth anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 Congratulatory speeches were made by heads of the delegations of the north, south and overseas sides.
					
					 Speeches were made by representatives of the north, south and overseas sides on the theme of "On opening the way of peace and reunification of Korean peninsula and north-south relations".
					
					 Speakers referred to the issue of improving the inter-Korean relations and settling the issue of the country's reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation responsible for it, the issue of preventing a war and establishing durable peace on the Korean peninsula and the issue of having multifaceted contact, visit and dialogue and successfully holding the joint national meeting.
					
					 A joint resolution was adopted at the seminar.
					
					 It expressed the will to preserve the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, conduct brisk activities for implementing them and firmly adhere to the spirit of national independence and great national unity.
					
					 It underlined the need to make all efforts for putting an end to the war crisis and building durable peace mechanism in the country, proactively conduct contact, visit, exchange and solidarity activities among all people from all walks of life at home and abroad and further raise the atmosphere of national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 It underscored the need to enhance the role of the preparatory committees for the joint meeting which had already been organized or are to be organized and focus all efforts on convening the joint meeting next year.

articles.title: Writers Union of Korea Launches Agitation Drive for Increased Production
articles.content:
Writers Union of Korea Launches Agitation Drive for Increased Production
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Writers of the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea are conducting active frontline-style agitation for increased production on the front for recovering from flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province.
					 Writers in Pyongyang and local areas conduct agitation for increased production through presentation of works and loudspeaker-agitation while touring northern areas and units producing materials for recovering.
					
					 In Musan and Yonsa Counties poets of the Central Committee created dozens of poems including "Let Us Go to Northern Front!" and "Sounds of victory boom on front full of love for people" and conducted agitation drive among tens of thousands of people.
					
					 Members of the North Hamgyong and North Hwanghae Provincial Committees of the Writers Union went to the construction site for dwelling houses in Hoeryong City and Onsong County to join in the drive of builders while creating works.
					
					 Meanwhile, poets in Pyongyang and local areas who were dispatched to the Chollima Steel Complex, Sangwon Cement Complex and Sunchon Cement Complex created many poems to call upon workers to conduct the drive for increased production.
					
					 Writers of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Writers Union encouraged the workers with such poems as "Here is also the front of recovering from flood damage in northern part" at the Hamhung Woodenware Factory.
					
					 Poets in Nampho City and Kangwon Province have created many poems including "To the Party's Call" to encourage workers who have turned out in the shipping of cement and other materials.
					
					 Writers in Jagang, South Phyongan and Ryanggang Provinces have created many works including "Stars move."

articles.title: More Aid Materials Sent to Flood-hit Areas
articles.content:
More Aid Materials Sent to Flood-hit Areas
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Industrial establishments in North Phyongan Province, the DPRK are boosting the production of equipment, foodstuff and daily necessities for the rehabilitation of disaster areas of North Hamgyong Province, in hearty response to the appealing call of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Taking the lead in the production campaign are the Rakwon Machine Complex, Sinuiju Shoes Factory, Pakchon Silk Mill, Amnokgang General Foodstuff Factory and Sinuiju Knitwear Factory.
					
					They have already sent several hydraulic excavators, tens of thousand pairs of shoes, thousands pieces of blankets, over 10,000 pieces of underwear and a large amount of food grains and foodstuff to the flood-hit areas.

articles.title: 17th National Software Exhibition of Educational Institutions
articles.content:
17th National Software Exhibition of Educational Institutions
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The 17th national software exhibition of educational institutions took place at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 According to Jong Yong Hui, vice department director of the Education Commission, over 1,000 valuable programs are presented to the exhibition by 100-odd universities and secondary and primary schools across the country.
					
					 Among them are a visual multilingual e-dictionary, achievement test software and e-blackboard, she said.
					
					 Kim Hye Yong, a teacher of Pyongyang Teacher Training College, said that the exhibition will be of significance in developing education.

articles.title: Public Presentation by Winners of Schoolchildren's Art Individual Contest Held
articles.content:
Public Presentation by Winners of Schoolchildren's Art Individual Contest Held
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A public presentation by winners of the 11th schoolchildren's art individual contest took place at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Monday, the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Put on the stage were duet "Thankful Party's Embrace," violin solo "March of Children's Union," male solo "My Pyongyang May Shine" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by developing the WPK into the mother party. 
					
					 Folk solo "The Student Is Me," kayagum solo "I Am a Flower Bud" and other pieces vividly and artistically portrayed the bright picture of schoolchildren growing up to be able revolutionary talents who are knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy under the loving care and blessing by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Dance "Member of Children's Corps Kum Sun," harmonica chorus "Playing of Revolutionary Army," accordion quartet "Song of Children's Partisan" and other pieces represented the will of the schoolchildren to be true children revolutionaries in the Songun era who devotedly defend the Party and ardently love the country like members of the Children's Corps during the anti-Japanese struggle and the Children's Vanguard and Children's Partisan in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 Among the audience were Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, and its officials, officials concerned and school youth and children.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Derides Obama's Theory of "World without Nuclear Weapons"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Derides Obama's Theory of "World without Nuclear Weapons"
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Obama's theory of "world without nuclear weapons" has invited international derision.
					 The Chinese Huan Qui Shibao said that after his inauguration in 2009 U.S. President Obama trumpeted about "world without nuclear weapons" on several occasions and won Nobel Peace Prize for that but in actually he has made the least reduction of nuclear weapons, deriding his call for "nuclear-free world" as a laughing stock.
					
					 The Austrian newspaper Der Standard said in an article that Obama's dream with which he won even the Nobel Prize is disappearing along with the expiry of his term, referring to the recent remarks of the U.S. Defence Secretary that "the U.S. nuclear weapons have become cornerstone guaranteeing its security".
					
					 This is a revelation of the deceptive nature of the U.S. initiative of "nuclear-free world" and clear reflection of the international aversion and derision.
					
					 The Obama administration which trumpeted about the "world without nuclear weapons" has made no mention of its own denuclearization but kept making play of words deceiving the world.
					
					 It, on the other hand, included the phrases calling for continued possession of its nuclear arsenal in the "defense strategy review report" and maintained that it has to "keep stable and effective nuclear deterrence," pursuant to its national security strategy.
					
					 In the 2015-2024 period the U.S. envisages the overall development of triad nuclear weapons i.e. strategic nuclear bombers, inter-continental ballistic missiles and nuclear submarines, at the expenses of 348 billion USD and is planning to spend 1 trillion USD for the nuclear modernization program within 30 years to come.
					
					 While giving further spurs to the nuclear arms race, the U.S. intends to invest 108 billion USD for the five years to come.
					
					 In the meantime, it is steadily introducing its strategic nuclear assets into south Korea, rendering the danger of a nuclear war to the extremes on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Not content with excluding the DPRK from the list of non-use of nuclear weapons and openly crying out for "containing it by nuclear weapons," the U.S. is seeking to bring the second Hiroshima and Nagasaki nuclear disasters through the racket of "preemptive nuclear strike" simulating an actual war.
					
					 The U.S. is the world's biggest nuclear criminal state and a chief culprit standing in the way of the denuclearization of the world as it spawned the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula with the unprecedented nuclear threats and blackmail and is keen on igniting a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. trumpeting about "world without nuclear weapons" even though it is regarding them as a means for realizing its world domination is the height of shamelessness and double-dealing attitude.
					
					 Obama, with the tenure of his office almost running out, is trying to cover up his crimes through the deceptive policy of no first-use of nuclear weapons and give impression that he has fulfilled his role as "Nobel Peace Prize winner" which he won with lies. But no one will be taken in by this.
					
					 Obama's departure from his office will leave the U.S. initiative of building a "world without nuclear weapons" as a laughing stock of the world.
					
					 What the international community wishes to see is a "world without the U.S." rather than the "world without nuclear weapons."

articles.title: DPRK Papers on WPK, Invincible Revolutionary Party
articles.content:
DPRK Papers on WPK, Invincible Revolutionary Party
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK leading newspapers Monday carry editorials to mark the 71st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The founding of the WPK was a solemn declaration that heralded the birth of new-type revolutionary party in the era of independence and a significant event that brought about a fundamental turn in carving out the destiny of the Korean nation, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Over seven decades since its foundation have been the history in which the great power of truth enshrined by the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was given full play in the struggle for building a powerful country, and the sacred one in which the party and people won victories while the former believing in the latter and vice versa.
					
					 The great leaders built our party into an invincible revolutionary party and the genuine political leadership organization that wages struggle for the people while forming a harmonious whole with them for the first time in history.
					
					 Thanks to the noble patriotic idea and leadership of the great leaders, our party has been able to demonstrate its might as defender of the people which firmly protected the destiny of the country and the nation with the successive victories in the showdown with the imperialists and the U.S., the creator of the people's happiness which built the powerful country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliance in defence, an eternal cradle for posterity, and as the great party which provided a firm foundation guaranteeing the eternal future of the people under the uplifted banner of Songun despite grim tempests of history.
					
					 Our party is shining as the great Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party which enjoys absolute support and trust of the people as it holds supreme leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 Invincible is the cause of the WPK as it has formed the harmonious whole with the people, devotedly serve the people and advance with the people's inexhaustible energy as a driving force.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the WPK is an invincible revolutionary party that leads the people's independent cause and the cause of building the powerful socialist country to victory. Absolute is the trust of service personnel and other people of the DPRK in the party and steadfast is their will to devote everything to the cause of building the powerful socialist power under the leadership of the party.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Prioritizing People, Army and Youth
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Prioritizing People, Army and Youth
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- One year has passed since supreme leader Kim Jong Un made a historic speech "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" at the military parade and public procession of the Pyongyang citizens held in celebration of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an article to the anniversary in which it says the past one year was a proud one in which the greatness of the WPK leading the Korean revolution to victory, responsible for the people's destiny, has been clearly demonstrated.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Our Party has wisely led the struggle to translate into a shining reality the ideal and dream of the people while making a sacred history of the people-first principle and turned the DPRK into a nuclear power in the East and the world's military power by channeling big efforts into bolstering up its military muscle.
					
					 Under the trust and loving care of the Party which put forward the young people as the creators of the spirit of the era and trained them as masters of the youth power, in particular, our young people are fully displaying their resourcefulness and valor at the worksites of the 200-day campaign including those sites for recovering from the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 The WPK is ushering in a golden age in building a rich and powerful country by prioritizing the people, army and youth. Herein lie in the greatness of the WPK and the bright prospect of the country.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the WPK to achieve the final victory of the Juche revolution by taking hold on the three strategies of prioritizing the people, army and youth as the best weapon.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Providing Shelters to Int'l Terrorists
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Providing Shelters to Int'l Terrorists
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary says the U.S. is vociferating about "anti-terrorism" worldwide but it is the kingpin of international terrorism as it is not qualified to talk about terrorism.
					 It is none other than the U.S. which is openly committing state-sponsored terrorist acts of violating the sovereignty of those countries courting its displeasure and it is also the U.S. which is offering shelters to international terrorists and letting them strut about, the commentary notes.
					
					 Recalling the Cuban airliner explosion committed by Posada who fled to the U.S. after the victory in the Cuban revolution 40 years ago, the commentary goes on:
					
					 UNSC resolution 137 which was adopted in 2001 calls for refraining from rendering any support to entities or persons involved in terrorist activities and rejecting any offer of shelters to those who plan, support or perpetrate terrorist acts.
					
					 The U.S. should have been put on the list of sponsors of terrorism for providing a shelter to international terrorist Posada in line with the UN resolution. But it is the real "anti-terrorist" policy of the U.S. which applies international law in its favor and disregards the law when it is unfavorable to it.
					
					 Terrorists are at large in different parts of the world due to the "anti-terrorist war" being committed by the U.S. for aggression in a bid to realize military domination over the strategic vantages and major resource zones. The "Islamic State" in the Mideast is a cancer-like entity that appeared as a result of the U.S. policy of dominating it.
					
					 Terrorism, worldwide trouble, can never be rooted out as long as the U.S. persists in its policy of aggression and domination.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hits out at S. Korean Authorities for Working Hard to Misrepresent Their Defeat in Korean War
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hits out at S. Korean Authorities for Working Hard to Misrepresent Their Defeat in Korean War
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday runs an article by a military commentator for hitting out at the south Korean puppet authorities for wasting time with confrontation rackets kicked up to "commemorate" and reenact battle fought during the Korean War, a tragedy in the history  of confrontation between compatriots and national division.
					 The article laid bare the disgusting and poor farces staged by the puppet forces to paint the shameful defeat they sustained as "victorious battle" and hide the military inferiority to the Songun capability for self-defence.
					
					 They raised the curtain of these burlesques by holding the "commemoration of Inchon landing operation" under the sponsorship of the south Korean puppet Ministry of Defence and Navy Headquarters.
					
					 The puppet authorities usually held the "commemoration" on September 15 every year. However, it advanced the event this year to September 9 under the pretext of overlapping the Harvest Moon Day.
					
					 They staged the "event marking the liberation of Seoul" on September 24, in the wake of reenacting "Rakdong River counter operation" on Sept. 22 and 23.
					
					 From Sept. 24 they staged "2016 Air Show" to "mark the Day of south Korea-U.S. Combined Air Force" in Osan and other parts of south Korea.
					
					 They observed what they called the "Day of ROK Army" on October 1.
					
					 No matter what desperate efforts they made to cover up their defeat in the last Korean War, they will get them nowhere, except for laying bare their despicable nature. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet army is bound to face severe punishment by history as it is nothing but a machine for keeping the rule of traitor Park Geun Hye, a tool for suppressing people, vanguard for escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, colonial mercenary army of the U.S. and its cannon-fodder.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Invective against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Invective against DPRK
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Days ago traitor Park Geun Hye spouted a stream of invective against the DPRK such as "provocations," "international isolation" and "economic difficulties" at a "commemorative event".
					 Meanwhile, south Korean puppet Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se cried out for cooperation with the U.S. and Japan in ratcheting up sanctions and pressure on the DPRK to cope with "nuclear and missile threat from the north" while puppet Prime Minister Hwang Kyo An vociferated about "every possible measure to deter nuclear provocations by the north."
					
					 Commenting on their outbursts, Minju Joson Monday says: 
					
					 No matter what malignant vituperation the Park Geun Hye group of traitors may reel off, the DPRK regards them as no more than barks of dogs at the moon,
					
					 Such ridiculous behaviors of the Park group are aimed to evade the responsibility for having driven the north-south relations into the worst catastrophe and tide over the serious ruling crisis.
					
					 The Park group is now in the grip of the unprecedentedly serious crisis.
					
					 Fierce anti-"government" and anti-Park Geun Hye actions are now going on in different parts of south Korea and political chaos is festering as the days go by due to her decision on THAAD deployment and scandals are reported from among those in power one after another. Consequently, south Korea has turned into terrible mayhem and the destiny of Park is like a fish out of water.
					
					 That is why Park, hit hard and forsaken at home and abroad, is going so busy hurling mud at the DPRK and soliciting for cooperation in escalating sanctions and pressure on it in a bid to survive.
					
					 Park Geun Hye group's desperate frenzy only betrays its true colors as wicked traitors and anti-reunification elements and precipitate its miserable end.

articles.title: Minju Joson Ridicules U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Muscle-flexing
articles.content:
Minju Joson Ridicules U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Muscle-flexing
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces staged the Red Flag Alaska 16 precision air strike drill in Alaska State in collusion with the U.S. and its vassal forces, openly asserting that the drill was aimed to make a "preemptive strike" at the DPRK's major military facilities and supreme headquarters.
					 Meanwhile, the puppet warmongers staged a provocative maneuver under the simulated conditions of a real battle against the north on Paekryong and Yonphyong islands, the biggest hotspots in the West Sea of Korea, from the end of September in collusion with U.S. marines.
					
					 Minju Joson Monday in a commentary terms the warmongers' saber-rattling as a serious provocation designed to bring the situation on the Korean peninsula to the worst crisis as it was part of the reckless hysteria for mounting a "preemptive attack" that has gone beyond the  danger line.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is an invariable ambition of the puppet group to stifle the DPRK by force of arms and achieve "unification through absorption".
					
					 Prompted by that scenario, the warmongers are getting frantic in the moves to escalate sanctions and the moves to stifle the DPRK, zealously pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK. They are, at the same time, taking the lead in carrying out the scenario of mounting a "preemptive attack" on the DPRK as war servants of the U.S.
					
					 But, their hysteria for mounting reckless "preemptive attack" is no more than the last-ditch efforts of the confrontation maniacs facing the total bankruptcy of the hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group, extremely scared by a series of measures being taken by the DPRK to bolster up the national capabilities for self-defence, are making desperate efforts as like burnt wolves while talking about someone's "preemptive attack." But these are no more than symptoms of the doomed.

articles.title: Support Rate for Park Geun Hye Falls in S. Korea
articles.content:
Support Rate for Park Geun Hye Falls in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Support rate for Park Geun Hye is continuously falling down in south Korea, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					 A public opinion poll was conducted from October 4 to 6 among more than a thousand people. It said the number of respondents, who showed negative view of Park Geun Hye's state administration, increased one percent as compared with that of last week.
					
					 Meanwhile, support rate for Park went down to the lowest since her assumption of office. 
					
					 This is the due estimation of the puppet group of Park which mercilessly trampled down self-respect and vital rights of the south Korean people through sycophancy toward the U.S., confrontation with the compatriots in the north, unpopular rule and fascist dictatorship and threatened the people's life by driving the situation to the brink of war.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Scandals Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Scandals Denounced
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The representative of the Minju Party of south Korea denounced scandals of the Park Geun Hye group at a meeting of the "National Assembly" on October 7, according to Newsis and newspaper Hangyore of south Korea.
					 He said the present "government" squeezed business groups and offered privileges to those businesses which put fund into foundations.
					
					 He urged Park Geun Hye to make rapid resolution to cope with the present situation where Chongwadae does not hear people's voice and state administration is becoming paralyzed.

articles.title: Joint Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Report to WPK Congress Held in Nepal
articles.content:
Joint Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Report to WPK Congress Held in Nepal
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar on "5. For Strengthening and Developing the Party" of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee took place in Nepal on Oct. 3 on the occasion of the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venue of the seminar were photos dealing with the leadership exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for party building.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) said that the feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be immortal as they achieved the unity and revolutionary cohesion of the entire party in thinking and purpose centering on the Party Central Committee and developed the WPK into invincible revolutionary party winning only victory.
					
					 The director of the International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist) noted that the revolutionary character of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party has been firmly preserved as it is led by Kim Jong Un and the Korean people would achieve shining successes in the drive for implementing the decision of the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 The chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association expressed hope that the Korean people would work greater miracles in the struggle for the reunification of the country and the building of a socialist power on the occasion of the party founding anniversary.
					
					 The participants of the seminar watched Korean film "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un" and looked round the photos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was published in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on October 5 on the 71st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised in Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised in Switzerland
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Glory to Comrade Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea!
					 The Swiss preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on October 4.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il was elected as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea on October 8, Juche 86 (1997), 19 years ago.
					
					 Thanks to HE Kim Jong Il who successfully carried forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung, the DPRK successfully launched its first satellite Kwangmyongsong-1 one year after that and succeeded in the first underground nuclear test in Juche 95 (2006).
					
					 The way for independence, Songun and socialism is the way HE Kim Jong Il firmly followed.
					
					 He showed the imperialists and reactionaries who vociferated about "collapse" of the DPRK that no formidable enemy can dare bring down socialist Korea.
					
					 He paved a wide avenue to independent and peaceful reunification of the country by formulating the lines for national reunification put forward by President Kim Il Sung as the three charters of national reunification.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's era was the great and glorious one.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del Presidente de Palestina
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del Presidente de Palestina
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le hiciera llegar el dia 10 el Presidente de Palestina y del Comite Ejecutivo de la Organizacion de Liberacion Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del Dia de fundacion del PTC, extiendo con gran placer las mas calurosas felicitaciones y saludos a Su Excelencia y por su conducto, al amistoso pueblo coreano en nombre del Estado y pueblo palestinos y en el mio propio.
					
					Y deseo a Su Excelencia la buena salud y felicidad y al pueblo coreano, el mayor progreso y prosperidad.
					
					Orgulloso de las historicas relaciones de amistad y respeto mutuo existentes entre los dos paises y pueblos, aprovecho esta oportunidad para encomiar la posicion de su pais que expresa el apoyo total y solidaridad al derecho nacional y la lucha del pueblo palestino por acabar con la agresion y fundar un Estado independiente que tenga como capital a Kuds oriental que sera la ciudad de paz, reconciliacion y coexistencia.

articles.title: Delegado coreano expone posicion de la RPDC sobre la ejecucion de nueva agenda
articles.content:
Delegado coreano expone posicion de la RPDC sobre la ejecucion de nueva agenda
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- El delegado coreano hizo uso de la palabra el dia 4 en el segundo comite (economia y finanzas) del 71o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU. 
					El senalo que son importantes la posicion y el papel del presente comite en asegurar la ejecucion exitosa de la agenda de desarrollo sostenible de 2030, aprobada en el ano pasado con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la ONU.
					
					Expuso la posicion de principios de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en ese tema como sigue:
					
					Primero, hay que respetarse el derecho a desarrollo independiente de todos los paises miembros para que se cumpla sin complicaciones la agenda de desarrollo sostenible.
					
					Para lograr las metas de desarrollo sostenible presentadas para fomentar el bienestar de la humanidad, se presentan como la mayor prioridad el problema de preparar el ambiente pacifico y poner el punto final a los actos despoticos y arbitrarios como hostilizar el regimen politico de otros paises con la norma y concepcion unilaterales y presionar y amenazar en las esferas politica, militar y economica.
					
					Segundo, el proceso de ejecucion de las metas de la agenda debe orientarse al fomento de desarrollo de la economia nacional de cada pais y al establecimiento del nuevo orden economico internacional.
					
					La realidad de hoy demanda que el Banco Mundial, el Fondo Monetario Internacional (FMI), la Organizacion Mundial de Comercio (OMC) y otras organizaciones financieras internacionales no permitan la posicion monopolista de los pocos Estados especificos y aseguren la plena representatividad a los paises emergentes de economia y los demas en vias de desarrollo.
					
					Al respecto, hay que prestar mayor atencion al desarrollo sostenible de los paises mas subdesarrollados, los interiores e islenos y los paises y pueblos en litigio y bajo la ocupacion extranjera dando enfoque a eliminar la desigualdad entre los paises en la implementacion de la agenda.
					
					En la RPDC se impulsa con vigor la construccion de potencia economica socialista anteponiendo la ciencia y tecnica a todas las labores y apoyandose en fuerzas, tecnicas y recursos propios.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC se esforzara en el futuro tambien por eliminar el viejo orden internacional y establecer las imparciales y justas relaciones economicas internacionales y contribuira mucho a los esfuerzos internacionales por alcanzar las metas presentadas en la nueva agenda.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia intencion de "ataque preventivo" de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia intencion de "ataque preventivo" de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos libraron en el Estado de Alaska de Estados Unidos el entrenamiento de ataque aereo preciso, Red Flag Alaska 16, con las fuerzas aereas de EE.UU. y sus satelites.
					Anunciaron abiertamente que esa maniobra es para "dar el golpe preventivo" contra las instalaciones militares principales y la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					Por otra parte, fomentaron el belicismo realizando desde finales de septiembre junto con la infanteria de marina estadounidense el entrenamiento militar para la agresion a la RPDC en las islas Paekryong y Yonphyong, zona mas cadente del Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					Tales actos de provocacion militar llevan la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a la fase de peor crisis.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y prosigue:
					
					Aplastar en lo militar a la RPDC y realizar la "unificacion mediante la absorbicion" constituyen la ambicion invariable de la banda titere surcoreana.
					
					Por eso, ella se puso al frente de la campana de sancion y aplastamiento contra la RPDC siendo complice de la politica hostil de EE.UU. y materializa con mayor entusiasmo el plan de "ataque preventivo" anti-RPDC de su amo gringo.
					
					Tal locura de los belicistas surcoreanos no pasa de ser el esfuerzo agonico de los maniacos de enfrentamiento que se volvieron desesperados por el fracaso total de su politica de aplastamiento anti-RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. y la horda traidora surcoreana estan aturdidos ante las medidas que toma la RPDC de modo multiple y consecutivo para consolidar la capacidad de autodefensa nacional.

articles.title: ACNC comenta el repudiado proyecto sobre "mundo sin armas nucleares"
articles.content:
ACNC comenta el repudiado proyecto sobre "mundo sin armas nucleares"
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- El proyecto de Obama sobre el "mundo sin armas nucleares" es ridiculizado por la sociedad internacional. 
					Recientemente, el periodico chino Huan Qiu Shibao senalo que despues de la toma del poder en el ano 2009, el presidente Obama insistio tanto en el "mundo desnuclearizado" y se gano hasta el Premio Nobel de la Paz, pero, resulto en realidad el presidente que redujo el menor numero de artefactos nucleares en EE.UU. 
					
					Un rotativo austriaco recordo que el secretario de Defensa norteamericano dijo hace poco que "las armas nucleares de EE.UU. sirven de piedra angular para la seguridad nacional" y censuro que el sueno de Obama, que recibio hasta el Premio Nobel de la Paz, desaparece poco a poco a medida que finaliza su mandato. 
					
					El hecho revela el caracter enganoso del proyecto sobre el "mundo sin armas nucleares" y la decepcion de la sociedad internacional. 
					
					La administracion Obama, que aparecio con la insistencia en la construccion en el "mundo sin armas nucleares", vino enganando al mundo con palabras sin hacer ninguna referencia a la desnuclearizacion de su pais. 
					
					Por el contrario, anoto en el "informe sobre la revision de estrategia de defensa nacional" el parrafo de mantener de continuo el arsenal nuclear y preconizo que EE.UU. debe seguir preservando el "disuasivo nuclear seguro y eficiente" segun la estrategia de seguridad nacional. 
					
					EE.UU. intenta desembolsar 348 mil millones de US$ en el plazo de 2015-2024 para desarrollar globalmente las tres fuerzas armadas nucleares compuestas por los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares, misiles intercontinentales y submarinos nucleares y trata de asignar un billon de US$ para el plan de modernizacion de armas nucleares dentro de 30 anos. 
					
					Ahora, dice en publico que en el proximo lustro, invertira 108 mil millones de US$ en la carrera armamentista nuclear. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, introduce sin parar sus propiedades estrategicas nucleares en el Sur de Corea, incrementando al extremo el peligro de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Insatisfecho con haber excluido a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de la lista de blancos de no uso de armas nucleares y declarado abiertamente "aplastarla con armas nucleares", recurre a la campana de "ataque preventivo nuclear" a fin de repetir los desastres nucleares de Hiroshima y Nagasaki. 
					
					El criminal nuclear mas grande y estorbador de la desnuclearizacion del mundo engendro con la inaudita amenaza y chantaje nucleares el problema nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y trata de provocar la guerra nuclear. 
					
					EE.UU. considera las armas nucleares como medio de cumplimiento de su ambicion de dominar al mundo y habla de la construccion del "mundo desnuclearizado", lo cual es el climax de cinismo y dualidad. 
					
					En el ultimo periodo de su mandato, Obama esta desesperado por ocultar sus crimenes con la enganosa politica de no ataque preventivo nuclear y finge como si cumpliera bien el papel del "ganador del Premio Nobel de la Paz", pero no puede enganar a nadie. 
					
					Con la salida del poder de Obama, su proyecto se quedara en la historia como una caricatura. 
					
					La sociedad internacional desea mas el "mundo sin EE.UU." que el "planeta sin armas nucleares".
